uls-desc: Ɔma ohyia kor a ɔdze adze bi dze dwuma akwannya bɛbere ma ɔfa kasa a ɔpɛ na ɔdandan ne dwumadze nso.
ext-uls-undo-language-tooltip-text-local: Kasa aw'asesa ɛfi dɛm wiki yi mu. Hwɛ wo [[Special:GlobalPreferences|global preferences]] kɔ kasa a w'dandan mu ma wiki nyenaa.
uls-betafeature-desc: Yi kasa ahorow yi mu kakra bi kyerɛ, dza ohia wo
ext-uls-display-settings-desc: Sesa menu na nsaano nkyerɛwee kasa no.
ext-uls-language-buttons-help: Sesa menu kasa no. No mu nsɛm no rennsesa.
ext-uls-display-settings-anon-log-in-cta: [[Special:UserLogin|Log in]] na sesa kasa fofor ma menus no.
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-title: Twe akyerɛw no bir a ɛhyia
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-info: Twe nkyerɛw a w'ayew no bir a nnkɔyɛ bebiara na ma nkyerɛw ndandan mu ho akwan nya.
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-ui-info: Akyerɛw a wɔdze dzi dwuma wɔ ɔyɛ no dze dwumadzi bia ɛnyim
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-content-info: Akyerɛw adze a wɔ dze dzi dwuma wɔ akyerɛw mu
ext-uls-back-to-display-settings: kɔ bia a mfɔnyi nhyehyɛɛ no wɔ no
ext-uls-input-settings-desc: Ɛrekyerɛw wɔ kasa fofor mu a?
ext-uls-back-to-input-settings: San kɔ nhyehyɛe a ɛdze hyɛ mu no
ext-uls-input-disable-info: Ndzɛmba a wɔ dze dzi dwuma no nyɛ edwuma
ext-uls-input-settings-noime: Dwumadzi horow biara nyi hɔ ma kasa yi.
ext-uls-input-disable-notification: Ndzɛmba a wɔ dze dzi dwuma no ndzi dwuma biara
ext-uls-input-disable-notification-info-: Ibotum ama ndzemba a wɔ dze dzi dwuma no akwannya bir biara wɔ kasa nhyehyɛɛ no mu.
Ibotum ama ndzɛmba a wɔ dze dzi dwuma no akwannya bir biara wɔ kasa nhyehhɛɛ no mu wɔ kasa kuw no nkyɛn.
ext-uls-compact-link-info: Kasa nyinara (ma edzikan fae nna ma obiara so fae)
ext-uls-compact-language-links-preferenc: Fa [[$1|compact language list]], kasa a ohia wo.
ext-uls-compact-no-results: Kasa a efaɛ no nnyi krataa yi mu.
ext-uls-setlang-error: Asɛm sii wɔ mber a ɛre sesa kasa a epɛ no. Error: $1
